name: Advanced Construct Companion
summary: You've upgraded your construct companion's power and decision-making ability.
description:
You've upgraded your construct companion's power and decision-making ability. It becomes an advanced construct companion. During an encounter, even if you don't use the Command a Minion action, your construct companion can still use 1 action on your turn that round to Stride or Strike.Advanced Construct Companion Leads To...

Incredible Construct Companion
